content: Is it possible (or on the roadmap) to generate a shorthand file from an instance?
+1. Roundtrip was discussed in DevDays and it is something that I think would be a sign of maturity
(side note: I'm curious what fish-related name will @Mark Kramer , @Chris Moesel give to that functionality :slight_smile: )

I'm not sure if we thought about it in regard to instances, but for translating an existing StructureDefinition (profile/extension) into FSH, @Mark Kramer came up w/ "Hatchery". While we think it's a super cool idea, we're currently focusing on development of the language and SUSHI reference implementation. Of course someone else can always pick up the idea and run with it! Er... swim with it?
